Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Becca's life prior to or as the outbreak began, except that she lived with her father, mother, and brother.
Post-Apocalypse[]: Becca is seen in a grocery store hiding with her mother and brother after her father Abraham kills multiple people, presumably survivors who harmed them. They are terrified of what Abraham has become and her mother leaves with Becca and A.J. the next day, but, upon finding a car, they are attacked and devoured by walkers . They are later found dead by Abraham.
Death[]: Killed By Abraham Ford (Indirectly Caused) Ellen Ford (Indirectly Caused) After Abraham brutally killed a group of men, Ellen was so terrified of Abraham that she ran away with their children. Zombies Becca, her mom and her brother run away from Abraham, being afraid of his brutality. However, they are attacked and devoured by walkers. The next day, their torn apart bodies are discovered by Abraham outside the grocery store.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Becca has killed: Possibly a few zombies
Appearances[]: " Self Help " (Flashback, No Lines) " Variant " (Archive Footage, Corpse)
Trivia[]: Becca appears in the archival footage shown at the beginning of " Variant " as Judith narrates past events of the show to the audience before the episode's story begins.
